content: the summer breeze cotton crochet hair band pattern is suitable for babies toddlers children and women this pattern offers a one-size-fits-all design and includes a step-by-step video tutorial for added convenience crafted from high-quality cotton this headband pattern offers both style and comfort making it the perfect accessory for any summer outfit its versatile design allows you to create a headband that perfectly fits anyone from a tiny newborn to an adult whether you re a beginner or an expert our easy-to-follow tutorial will guide you through the process ensuring a flawless result perfect for gifting craft fairs and party favors this pattern is sure to impress don t miss out on this opportunity to showcase your creativity and create stunning headbands for yourself or your loved ones get your hands on our summer breeze cotton crochet headband pattern today finished measurements 38 including ties 15 shells only materials needed tapestry needle stitch markers scissors measuring tape 10-12 grams worsted weight yarn - cotton or acrylic both work great with this pattern 5 00 mm crochet hook
